snippet: Ben Ryan took his gold-medal favorite Fiji men's squad along to watch the women's rugby sevens quarterfinals, hoping their presence would inspire another Fijian team to win a race for the Pacific island nation's first Olympic medal....
lead_paragraph: Ben Ryan took his gold-medal favorite Fiji men's squad along to watch the women's rugby sevens quarterfinals, hoping their presence would inspire another Fijian team to win a race for the Pacific island nation's first Olympic medal.

headline.main: Men's Rugby Ready for Rio After 92-Year Olympic Absence
headline.print_headline: Men's Rugby Ready for Rio After 92-Year Olympic Absence
